Text.Page:
The kulkari threaten everything I'm sworn to protect. Wiping them out probably isn't the answer, but killing a couple of key players might be.

What do you think of taking out their leaders, {@LinkCreature:26#101#Kuru} and {@LinkCreature:26#102#Taroku}? That might make a difference.
Maybe getting rid of those two will keep the rest quiet. Might even save their lives. We can hope, eh?
The quicker you kill those two and get back here, the sooner this forest can start getting back to normal. Got that?
